AER.description: aerosol treatment in an atmospheric model where concentrations are calculated based on emissions, transformation, and removal processes (rather than being prescribed or omitted entirely)
AER.name: AER

AGCM.description: atmospheric general circulation model run with prescribed ocean surface conditions and usually a model of the land surface
AGCM.name: AGCM

AOGCM.description: coupled atmosphere-ocean global climate model, additionally including explicit representation of at least the land and sea ice
AOGCM.name: AOGCM

BGC.description: biogeochemistry model component that at the very least accounts for carbon reservoirs and fluxes in the atmosphere, terrestrial biosphere, and ocean
BGC.name: BGC

CHEM.description: chemistry treatment in an atmospheric model that calculates atmospheric oxidant concentrations (including at least ozone), rather than prescribing them
CHEM.name: CHEM

LAND.description: land model run uncoupled from the atmosphere
LAND.name: LAND

OGCM.description: ocean general circulation model run uncoupled from an AGCM but, usually including a sea-ice model
OGCM.name: OGCM

RAD.description: radiation component of an atmospheric model run 'offline'
RAD.name: RAD

SLAB.description: slab-ocean used with an AGCM in representing the atmosphere-ocean coupled system
SLAB.name: SLAB
